name: Thrift Store
description: A shop selling second-hand goods and used items; adventurers can find hidden treasures among the cast-offs, purchase affordable gear, or discover the history behind unusual objects.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the musty scent of second-hand goods and the sound of customers browsing through cast-off items and the rustle of used clothing being examined. The air carries the promise of affordable treasures and the essential nature of recycling goods, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of treasure hunting and the excitement of discovering valuable items among the ordinary cast-offs.
